property.name: Name
property.description: Type "C". Name of report. String Name property

property.name: Source
property.description: Type "C". Source data definiton. String Source property

property.name: Calcs
property.description: Type "C". CR-LF separate list of Calcuated Field Definitons.

property.name: grand
property.description: Type "ReportDataGroup". Pointer to the top level JSON group.

property.name: Arguments
property.description: Type "SQL::Arguments". SQL Arguments to pass use during the generation of JSON data.

property.name: ExcelTemplate
property.description: Type "ReportExcelTemplate". Excel formatting template (expresses how to generate the excel).

methodref.name: ApplyOrder
methodref.description: Apply an order (modify definition to include added order at detail level).

methodref.name: GenerateExcel
methodref.description: Generate data to an excel spreadsheet.

methodref.name: GenerateJson
methodref.description: Generate Data data for defined report.

methodref.name: GenerateRawData
methodref.description: Emits the raw data of the report.

methodref.name: GetCurrentFilter
methodref.description: Expand the current filter for the report object.

methodref.name: GetDefinition
methodref.description: Get JSON for definition of report generation object.

methodref.name: SetParentSession
methodref.description: Sets the parent session so that global context can be shared with generated reports.

page.original:
Reporting::ReportDataGenerate Class Properties Property Type Description Name C Name of report. Source C Source data definiton Calcs C CR-LF separate list of Calcuated Field Definitons. Parameters C Named parameters. grand ReportDataGroup Pointer to the top level JSON group. Arguments SQL::Arguments SQL Arguments to pass use during the generation of JSON data. ExcelTemplate ReportExcelTemplate Excel formatting template (expresses how to generate the excel).
Methods Method Description PUBLIC ApplyOrder AS v (order AS C)Apply an order (modify definition to include added order at detail level). PUBLIC Clone AS P ()Create a copy of an object instance. PUBLIC GenerateExcel AS v (filename [ AS C ,C parameters [ AS ,N start = 0 [ AS ,N limit = 0]]] AS )Generate data to an excel spreadsheet. PUBLIC GenerateJson AS C (parameters [ AS [C ,N start = 0 [ AS ,N limit = 0]]] AS )Generate Data data for defined report. PUBLIC GenerateRawData AS C ()Emits the raw data of the report. PUBLIC GetDefinition AS c ()Get JSON for definition of report generation object. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type. PUBLIC Populate AS v (definition AS C)Populate using a JSON definition. PUBLIC SetParentSession AS v (parentSession AS N)Sets the parent session so that global context can be shared with generated reports.
See Also Reporting Namespace
